Package de.hshannover.dqgui.framework.dialogs

Class DialogContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshannover.dqgui.framework.dialogs.DialogContext
  • public final class DialogContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Create dialogs that can either show information to the user or collect user input.

    Dialogs are always blocking which means that the user has to confirm or close the dialog before being allowed to interact with the application again.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  DialogContext.DialogStyle
      Image to display within the dialog.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static DialogContext ANONYMOUS_CONTEXT
      Anonymous context that allows creation of dialogs without an owner.
      This will fail on multi-monitor setups as the dialog will always be created on the default monitor and not on the one where the anonymous context has been called from.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

        public static final DialogContext ANONYMOUS_CONTEXT
        Anonymous context that allows creation of dialogs without an owner.
        This will fail on multi-monitor setups as the dialog will always be created on the default monitor and not on the one where the anonymous context has been called from.
